summary: Combines fire, frost, shock, and the new whirlwind cloak into one power.  Dragonborn DLC required
descriptionHtml:
This adds a new Lesser Power to the game called Elemental Vortex.  It is learnable through a book called Voice Power: Elemental Vortex which can be found on a table next to the entrance to the Great Porch in Dragonsreach

Stats:
Lasts 15 seconds and activates all 4 cloaks, dealing
8 damage/sec fire damage
8 damage/sec frost damage
8 damage/sec shock damage
whirlwind cloak effect, 100% chance

I am open to suggestions if you want alternate files to alter the effect to last longer, deal more/less damage, etc.

Installation:
Drag the .esp into your data folder
Dragonborn DLC required
author: Chpettmd
